snippet: A Treasury under secretary said fiscal and monetary policies should be aimed at achieving domestic objectives.
abstract: Treasury Under Secretary Lael Brainard says member nations of Group of 20 should have fiscal and monetary policies aimed at achieving domestic objectives and move toward market-determined exchange rates.
lead_paragraph: A Treasury under secretary said fiscal and monetary policies should be aimed at achieving domestic objectives.

headline.seo: Euro in the Spotlight Ahead of Meetings
headline.main: Market-Based Currencies Are Urged for G-20 Agenda
headline.print_headline: Market-Based Currencies Are Urged for G-20 Agenda
